job description:
Transforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. It takes teams of the best and the brightest, working together to make an impact.
As one of the largest healthcare technology companies in the U.S., we are a catalyst to accelerate the journey toward improved lives and healthier communities.
Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.

If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.
Pursue purpose. Champion innovation. Earn trust. Be agile. Include all.

Empower Your Future. Make a Difference.Data Scientist
The Data Science group was formed to dramatically increase leverage of Change Healthcare’s data assets to create material new revenue opportunities. The data assets of more than 1,300 payers, 750,000 physicians and over 220 million Americans, totaling more than $1.3 trillion of claims value uniquely positions Change Healthcare to improve the US Healthcare system. This is an opportunity to solve some of the most challenging business problems in healthcare at a scale that few companies can match.

We’re looking for data scientists with a passion for technology to help drive a new generation of data and machine learning enabled services and products to impact Healthcare. You will enjoy working with top-notch people, one of the richest data sets in US healthcare, cutting edge technology, and the ability to see your insights turned into real products. The perfect candidate will have a background in machine learning, will have experience working with large data sets, and will have some experience in building and deploying data-driven solutions. You are scrappy, focused on results, a self-starter, and have demonstrated success in using data science to develop and deploy products of significant note.

Responsibilities
? Apply your expertise to see beyond the numbers and understand the most important questions our data can answer
? Partner with Product, Engineering and Design teams to solve problems, generate and test hypotheses and deliver prototype and production models
? Inform, influence, support, and execute our product decisions



Join our team today where we are creating a better coordinated, increasingly collaborative, and more efficient healthcare system!
